item.title: Example 1: OpenCV WebCam access
item.description: Example 1: OpenCV WebCam access Introduction In this example, we are using the PythonImage module and access your WebCam to show the video in a View2D. Steps to do Creating the network to be used for testing Add the modules to your workspace and connect them as seen below. Example Network The viewer is empty because the image needs to be set via Python scripting. Info:  More information about the PythonImage module can be found here Create a Macro Module Now you need to create a Macro Module from your network.
